properties.title: SENSE4GPP
properties.description: Assess time-space variability of terrestrial gross primary production  (GPP) of terrestrial ecosystems by a synergistic exploitation of the complementary information provided by  the Sentinel missions (Sentinel-2, Sentinel-3 and Sentinel-5P) at multiple spatial and temporal resolutions, as well as other Earth Observation and in situ data.
properties.osc:name: SEN4CARBON Theme 1: Terrestrial Gross Primary Production (SEN4GPP)
